Im new to the game (Just got it 10 minutes before posting this) and I need help. I press 'Start Game' and it shows me mission control, the launch pad, and a big field. I want to know what to do after that. Please help! Thanks!

-S

welcome to the game !

you press the white building to build a rocket

and then try it out on the launch pad

oh and be sure to follow the tutorials they are a must !
Be sure to press T before launch, I don't think the tutorials specify that.
What does T do? I don't remember it from the tutorial, and I haven't found a game manual or anything..

What does T do? I don't remember it from the tutorial, and I haven't found a game manual or anything..

T toggles the S.A.S Module, F activates it while F is down.

T toggles the S.A.S Module, F activates it while F is down.

Thanks! So hit T at liftoff and hold down F when unstable?

Thanks! So hit T at liftoff and hold down F when unstable?

No. Either you hit T to toggle S.A.S or hold F to activate S.A.S.

No. Either you hit T to toggle S.A.S or hold F to activate S.A.S.

You want SAS to be on for most of your launch to help you keep the vehicle stable, T saves you the bother of having to hold F down all the time.
